attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to get answers for why ICE detention centers have â€œlostâ€ 3000 children and why Mr. President Trump has not addressed this child trafficking. How ICE detention centers are essentially being gassed by having extremely powerful disinfectant sprayed every 15-20 minutes without proper ventilation. Why ICE detention center said they are not responsible for the sexual abuse by its staff members. Why Mr. President Trump said about Ivanka â€œPerhaps if she wasnâ€™t my daughter I would be dating her.â€ Why he asked if itâ€™s normal â€œto be more sexually attracted to my daughter than my wife.â€ Why his mind would immediately to go sex when asked what he has in common with Ivanka. Talking about 1 year old Tiffanyâ€™s breast saying â€œShe has her moms legs but we donâ€™t know yet if she has her...â€ while gesturing to his breast. Why he said â€œThereâ€™s good people on both sides.â€ About a white supremacy rally but calls all BLM protesters terrorist. Why he retweeted a video of people yelling â€œWhite Power!â€ When Kayleigh McEnany said Mr. President Trump deleted the tweet of him saying â€œThank you great people of The Villagesâ€ because he didnâ€™t hear the yelling of â€œWhite Power!â€ right by the phone even though he watched entire video, she continued to say he STILL stood with the great people of The Villages showcased in the video. Why he opposes defunding the police but threatens to defund public education. Why he doesnâ€™t want his children brought into politics but then threatens the children of the United States education in a hissy fit because he wants the economy to look better in time for the election. Sadly I was disappointed to find that the app was just made as a fan base  that oddly talks about Biden as much as it does Trumps plans for the future and explanations for the things he has said and done.
